channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel's classified military plans for Gaza. And, defining "buy-now, pay-later" loans
item.description: Israel is considering plans for a full-scale ground invasion of Gaza within a few months. And, examining the pros and cons of "buy-now, pay-later" loa...

item.title: Things people forget to clean the most, according to cleaning experts
item.description: Kyshawn Lane of Weekly Home Check and Dana K. White, author of Decluttering at the Speed of Life, share their top house cleaning hacks and tips.

item.title: Could legal weed make you sick? Here's how California tries to keep it safe
item.description: With no help from the federal government, states are trying to regulate recreational marijuana. California's Department of Cannabis Control works to k...

item.title: Reporter's notebook: 8 theories why fentanyl deaths are plummeting
item.description: Some 30,000 fewer people are dying every year in the U.S. from fentanyl and other street drugs. This shift has stunned addiction experts, reversing de...

item.title: Israel's latest war plans: To occupy Gaza and rule Palestinians
item.description: Occupying Gaza and establishing military rule there would go beyond Israel's stated war goals to end Hamas rule and free hostages captured in the Oct....

item.title: Greenland condemns planned visits by Usha Vance and Trump adviser
item.description: The pair will make separate trips this week, after threats from the US president to take over the island.

item.title: Gérard Depardieu goes on trial in France accused of sexual assaults
item.description: French cinema icon Gérard Depardieu stands accused of sexually assaulting two women during the filming of Les Volets Verts (The Green Shutters) in Par...

item.title: Stocks jump amid signs Trump could scale back tariffs
item.description: Dow surges more than 500 points as White House signals that President Trump might narrow scope of planned tariffs.

item.title: Tiger Woods confirms relationship with Trump's ex daughter-in-law
item.description: The veteran golfer announces he is dating Vanessa Trump, who used to be married to Donald Trump Jr.

item.title: US deportations to Venezuela resume after dispute
item.description: Nearly 200 people were on board the flight carrying Venezuelan migrants repatriated from the US.

item.title: 12 dozen lawmakers accused in 8 years. Women in the statehouse weigh #MeToo’s impact
Conan O'Brien honored at Kennedy Center; Trump targeted by many comics
item.description: As Conan O'Brien was honored with the Mark Twain Prize at the Kennedy Center, many comics targeted President Trump from the stage.

item.title: The Puzzling Death of Susann Sills
item.description: The wife of a fertility doctor is found dead at the bottom of a staircase. Did her dogs play a role in her death or was the scene staged to cover a mu...

item.title: Chad condemns Sudan's airport threat as 'declaration of war'
item.description: A Sudanese general said Chad's airports were legitimate targets because they were used to supply weapons.

item.title: Wildfires in the Carolinas prompt evacuations, emergency declarations
item.description: For the second time in less than a month​, residents in one North Carolina county have faced evacuations due to wildfires.

item.title: Tate brothers report to Romanian police after return from US
item.description: The brothers report to police as part of an ongoing criminal investigation after returning from the US.

item.title: In West Virginia coal country, new Social Security barriers present challenges to the most vulnerable
item.description: New requirements that Social Security recipients go online or in person to a field office to access key benefits, instead of just making a phone call,...

item.title: New Hampshire town elections offer a preview of citizenship voting rules being considered nationwide
